definitions.definition: To stand about without any aim or purpose; to stand about idly .
examples: For some reason, they discourage loitering outside the store, but encourage it inside.

definitions.definition: To stroll about without any aim or purpose, to ramble , to wander .
To remain at a certain place instead of moving on.
For an aircraft to remain in the air near a target.

main_definition: To stand about without any aim or purpose; to stand about idly .
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) To stroll about without any aim or purpose, to ramble , to wander .
To remain at a certain place instead of moving on.
( military , aviation ) For an aircraft to remain in the air near a target.
